summary: Armed only with their cameras, Peabody and Emmy Award-winning conflict Journalist Mike Boettcher, and his son, Carlos, provide unprecedented access into the longest war in U.S. history.
cast: Frank Adamski|Ofren Arrechaga|Ed Bankston|Carlos Boettcher|Mike Boettcher|Bryan Burgess|Christian Cabaniss|Jeremy Faulkner|Dustin Feldhaus|Chris Fields|Brit Jacobs|Jameson Lindskog|Steve Lutsky|Kevin Mott|Tye Reedy|Kellis Richardson|Diane Sawyer|Shane Shelton|Jeremy Sizemore|J.B. Vowell|Kalen M. Waite
title: The Hornet's Nest
